title: Vulcan Ventures
opening: Prepare your crew, Captain, as you set a course for Vulcan. Known for its logical inhabitants and stark landscapes, Vulcan presents unique challenges and opportunities.

planets.name: Vulcan
planets.description: The home planet of the Vulcan species, renowned for its advanced diplomatic relations and technological innovations.

actions.outcome: Your scans reveal a complex array of geological formations, possibly suitable for mining rare minerals.
After establishing communication, the Vulcan High Command extends greetings and offers to share their knowledge of astrophysics.
You participated in a diplomatic meeting that enhanced interstellar relations and fostered new scientific collaborations.
Your crew explores the ancient ruins on Vulcan, gaining valuable insights into Vulcan's history and culture.

end: As your ship leaves the orbit of Vulcan, your crew is richer in knowledge and your federation's ties with Vulcan are stronger. Where will your journey take you next, Captain?
